job.title: Fully Remote Machine Learning Software Engineer - $180k+
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Staffing and Recruiting,Human Resources
job.description: Fully Remote AWS Machine Learning Software Engineer- $180k+  This organization is a platform-based company that uses machine learning to provide health systems with a single solution for automating revenue cycling operations. This company is RAPIDLY growing and never stopped growing during the pandemic. They offer excellent benefits, a competitive salary, 401K, and unlimited PTO. They have a great career advancement structure and are looking for the best and brightest to join their excellent team.  Please apply ASAP if you are interested in learning more about this opportunity and we can set up a time to speak today! m.epstein@jeffersonfrank.com  AWS / Software Engineer / Machine Learning / Python / C++
